app.title: Intelligent PDF Quick Link Query System
app.subtitle: AI-powered PDF document analysis and information extraction
app.description: Upload PDF documents and extract structured information using advanced LLM technology

upload.title: Upload PDF Document
upload.drag_drop: Drag and drop your PDF file here, or click to browse
upload.invalid_format: Invalid file format. Please upload a PDF file.

query.title: Select Query Types
query.description: Choose the types of information you want to extract from the document
query.no_selection: Please select at least one query type.

results.title: Extraction Results
results.no_results: No information found matching the selected criteria.

errors.network_error: Network connection error. Please check your connection.
errors.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.file_error: File processing error. Please check the file format.
errors.extraction_error: Information extraction failed. Please try again.
errors.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
